name: Generatorcious
description:
I Made a "Weird Shit Generator" Which can be used for any kind of project (comerical, non-comerical, personal), for ideas, asset generation, tinkering about, having fun, etc :)

In the download i have not only attached the gen.exe (works on windows, linux under wine), but also the source code in text (.txt) format too if you want to recreate it in your language/program of choice. I sadly can't give you a mac build but the source code is there if you know how to port it :) 

I have also attached the assets made (90*2 tiles), which are also available to use for any kind of project (comerical, non-comerical, personal) :)

If you have any questions, feel free to tweet at me at https://twitter.com/Cellusious or throw me a mail at: Cellusious at gmail.com
